name: Awakening of Lucidia
description: Pursue the echo of Lucidia through ritual, gateway, and astral communion.

stages.title: Perform Lucid Ritual
stages.deadlineNote: Complete the Lucid Pulse ritual before sunrise.

stages.title: Enter Dreamgate
stages.deadlineNote: Open the Dreamgate during the waxing moon.

stages.title: Meet Lucid Echo
stages.deadlineNote: Confront the Lucid Echo under a still mind.

name: Panty Submission Trials
description: Embrace Ekram's humiliating gauntlet to unlock shameful power.

stages.title: Sniff Ekram's Panties
stages.deadlineNote: Submit the confession within Ekram's chamber.

stages.title: Confess Ritual in Chamber
stages.deadlineNote: Recite the chamber ritual before midnight.

stages.title: Burn Tokens for Cleansing
stages.deadlineNote: Burn the dirty tokens under the full moon.
